menu.description: A variety of classic soups, available for lunch or dinner.

items.name: Hot & Sour Soup
items.description: Traditional spicy and tangy soup with tofu and vegetables.

items.name: Egg Drop Soup
items.description: Light chicken broth swirled with beaten eggs.

items.name: Wonton in Egg Drop Soup
items.description: Wonton dumplings in a flavorful egg drop broth.

items.name: Sliced Pork & Mixed Vegetable Soup
items.description: Hearty soup with tender pork and assorted vegetables.

items.name: West Lake Beef w/ Cilantro Soup
items.description: Savory beef soup with fresh cilantro.

menu.description: Warm, savory starters to begin your meal.

items.name: Egg Rolls
items.description: Crispy rolls stuffed with shredded vegetables and pork.

items.name: Scallion Pancakes
items.description: Pan-fried flaky pancakes with scallions.

items.name: Pork Dumplings (6)
items.description: Steamed or pan-fried dumplings with savory pork filling.

items.name: Chicken Wings
items.description: Fried chicken wings served with a sweet and spicy sauce.

menu.description: Chilled dishes with bold, refreshing flavors.

items.name: Bang-Bang Chicken
items.description: Shredded chicken in a spicy sesame sauce.

items.name: Dan Dan Cold Noodles
items.description: Cold noodles tossed in a spicy peanut-chili sauce.

items.name: Sliced Pork w/ Garlic Sauce
items.description: Chilled pork slices drizzled with garlic-infused chili sauce.

menu.description: Mon-Fri, 11:30 am - 3:00 pm (except holidays). Includes choice of Egg Drop, Hot & Sour, or Wonton Soup. Served with Steamed White Rice, Brown Rice, or Vegetable Fried Rice (except L13 - L17). Price: $12

items.name: General Tso's Tofu
items.description: Tofu stir-fried in a sweet and tangy sauce.

items.name: Broccoli w/ Garlic Sauce
items.description: Fresh broccoli florets in a garlicky brown sauce.

items.name: Chengdu Pork w/ Peking Sauce
items.description: Sliced pork in a sweet and sour style sauce, classic Chengdu flavor.

items.name: Shrimp w/ Mixed Vegetables
items.description: Shrimp stir-fried with a variety of fresh vegetables.

items.name: Chengdu Spicy Chicken
items.description: Chicken stir-fried with chili peppers, Sichuan style.

menu.description: Hearty noodle bowls served hot. Customize spice level on request.

items.name: Seafood Noodle Soup
items.description: Noodle soup with shrimp, fish, and assorted vegetables in a savory broth.

items.name: Chengdu Spicy Beef Noodles
items.description: Sliced beef in a rich spicy broth with noodles and bok choy.

items.name: Pork & Pickled Cabbage Noodle Soup
items.description: Savory pork with tangy pickled cabbage in a clear broth.
